Customers like the fabric, describing it as nice quality and great for summer, and appreciate its softness. Regarding size, while some find it true to size, others mention it runs a little big. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars FABULOUS DRESSES! FLATTERING STYLE AND FABRIC!!
items.body: UPDATE--after many wearings and washes, these dresses still look great--both colorful and stylish. With the soaring heat, I wear one every day to work! Receive many compliments. This dress is comfy, flowing and flattering!! I have lost some weight and needed some new dresses. I wanted some comfy dresses in some bright colors for the upcoming Spring and Summer. These popped up in my search. I was not sure about these and the material, but after reading the reviews, I found my size and order 4 of them in different colors. I was either going to be set, or be disappointed. WELL, I AM DELIGHTED! These are so comfy and easy to wear. The colors are bright and fun. The fabric drapes well over my frame and is very flattering on my, still, plus frame. They are maxi length, but not too long, as others I have purchased, and I am 5'4". After all of that, they have pockets!! This is a must have for me!! I am so happy and will order more, as this seller has a lot of colors!! Read more
items.author: CHERYL

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great summer dress
items.body: Love this dress. Simple, fits well, comfortable, and can be dressed up with a scarf or necklace. It washes well. I tumble dry on light then hang it up immediately. Read more
items.author: Soldier Girl

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color-attractive-useful
items.body: I'm 80 years old, 180 lb. 5'9" X-large I love dresses made like this for summer. I gave this 4 stars because the waist was a little high and I didn't think the skirt had as much flow as it appeared in the picture. But with that said I am keeping it. I bought the green, it is a beautiful bright color and the material seems a good lasting quality . I thought is felt heavy when I opened the package but once on It fit well with good stretch across the chest. It is comfortable, attractive and the length is exactly as shown. It looked well alone and with a white denim jacket so it will be useful most of the year. I thought the price to be very good for something so comfortable and useful. With all that said perhaps I was wrong and it deserves 5 stars. Hope you enjoy it too. Read more
items.author: B Campbell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Red color is beautiful, very good quality, nicely made
items.body: Sometimes it’s hard to find a good red in clothing. It’s too wine-y, too orange, too pink, etc. This dress is a beautiful solid firecracker/Christmas red. Lovely! Just the thing for a picnic or fun summer day out! At 5’7” and 145 I tried the M but decided I could use the S. I’m not busty, just a B cup, but my shoulders are broad so the fit across the shoulders can be iffy for me. I don’t think sizing down would work for a larger cup size because the smaller dress would also have a slightly higher empire waist. In this case the fabric is stretchy enough that it worked for me. The fabric is soft, comfortable, and does not wrinkle. I haven’t washed it yet. I like the blend of materials and believe it will be comfortable in summer heat. I have tried this same style by a couple of other manufacturers and Anrabess uses a fabric blend I like better (it feels more cottony, less synthetic). I plan to purchase a couple of other colors. Another manufacturer of this same style dress uses a poly spandex blend that has that space-dye look where the color of the fabric isn’t quite solid. That’s not my thing. Read more
items.author: north carolina transplant

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and pretty
items.body: Bought this while recuperating from surgery and needing easy-to-wear clothes. This was as comfortable as a nightgown but pretty and opaque enough to wear outside. Fabric has some stretch without being clingy and doesn't feel flimsy. Generously sized. XXL was too large even though that corresponded to the size chart. XL was fine. Washed well in cold water without fading or shrinking and hang-dried. I went back and bought this in a bunch of colors. Read more
items.author: Greenman

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars The style is comfortable
items.body: I’m not crazy about the material, but I definitely like the style thank you Read more
items.author: ana

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A timeless dress to add to your wardrobe
items.body: This dress is classic! It fits in all the right spots. I got both a navy and a deep green. The material is a soft jersey knit and isn't see through however it still breaths. The colors described are spot on. It sways beautifully when walking and is at a very modest length. It would look beautiful dressed up or dressed down because it's so neutral. Oh! Did I mention it has POCKETS? Well it does and they are good sized. Not deep enough to hold a phone but more to hold Chapstick or small set of keys. A phone in the pockets would definitely weigh this dress down. I did however feel the need for a slip as this dress clings to the rumpus a tad. Also, I had to size down. I originally bought 2 large but I felt I looked frumpy (and it still clung) but the medium is absolutely made for me. I'm 165 lbs and 5'7" and usually wear a large, if that helps. Read more
items.author: Wheelhouse Sports

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress and bought other colors
items.body: I love this dress !!! It’s perfect for teachers. Fits to size Read more
items.author: andrea henriques

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Deep Green, Peach, Fuchsia, Rose, Army Green, Black, Grass, Coffee, Orange, Brick Red, Lake Green, Royal Blue, Sky Blue, Gray. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
